title: ABOUT
intro: I'm SOM_WHY, crafting warm, quiet worlds from sound—where organic textures meet clinical precision, exploring biological growth versus synthetic decay.

manifesto.title: Creative Manifesto
manifesto.content: “I find music in the gaps between silence. Every frequency is a sprout, every distortion is a storm. We don't compose; we cultivate soundscapes until they breathe on their own.”
